item.title: The Black & Brown Show - The Sun Day Rundown - Dec 20,2009
item.description:
The Sun Day Rundown is Your Official Online Parliament! This is our summary of the week as well as preparation for the coming week. For listeners who call in but never get through (and we do apologize for that) this is the show to call in express your thoughts with us. Tune in at our usual 12pm time for another dose of the Black & Brown Show. Remember, to be in tune, you must tune in. Peace

item.title: The Black & Brown Show - Free Thought Friday's - Dec 18,2009
item.description:
Free Thought Friday's came to be after having a conversation with one of our listeners, commenting on the subjects from the show. So we thought it would be a good idea to tackle some of this touchy issues live on the show every week. The free thought for this friday, Who and What is God? Call in and share with us what your thoughts, beliefts, or ideology is. We look forward to the build.

item.title: The Black & Brown Show - The Sun Day Rundown - Oct 25,2009
item.description:
The Sun Day Rundown is our summary of the week as well as preparation for the coming week. For listeners who call in but never get through (and we do apologize for that) this is the show to call in express your thoughts with us. Tune in at our usual 12pm time for another dose of the Black & Brown Show. Remember, to be in tune, you must tune in. Peace

item.title: Black & Brown Show - Hustle & Win w/ Supreme Understanding Allah - Oct 24,2009
item.description:
Author and community leader, Supreme Understanding Allah has been giving all he has and all within his power to improve the conditions of original people for quite some time. He will build on his experience in the Nation of Gods and Earths and how the knowledge of self helped him on his quest to master finance and how to feed yourself. Basically, how to hustle and win.

item.title: Black & Brown Show - Nation History w/Lord Just Allah - Oct 23,2009
item.description:
Peace. We had to take a short hiatus but we're back and better than ever! Thank you to those who checked out the first episode, we appreciate your support. Tune in this Friday (10.23.09) for a full length show filled with key information, mind-blowing builds and the latest unheard music that the industry is blind to. Special for friday's show: Lord Just Allah - he is a great God currently residing in Now Cee (North Carolina) and doing terrific works in the community. Lord Just will be building on the history of the Nation of Gods and Earths; as well as his personal experience with the First 9 Born. You dont want to miss out. The show will air promptly at 11am EST. and will be available for replay after the show is official off the air.
